remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供有关行、 列和要在表中支持的单元格绘制的单元格的边界信息。The class provides information about the row, column, and bounds of the cell to support painting of the cell in the table. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何自定义的外观控件。The following example shows how to a to customize the appearance of a control. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供控件。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the control.
